selectHubPanel.title: Select hub
selectHubPanel.message: Select the hub to restore the official {lego} firmware on, then click {next}.

ble.message: When the progress bar is done, the hub will reboot and the app will connect. The official firmware has been restored.

instruction2.updateApp: Once the recovery is complete, use the {app} app to get the latest official firmware.
instruction2.updateAppVersion: You can use version 2 (legacy) or version 3 to do so.
